messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] roly-poly bugs
messages.messageBody:
on 6/1/02 12:08 PM, Alan & Brenda Leonard at abtleo@... wrote:

> sorry, Joyce,
> I just could not resist, and it appears that you have the sense of humor to

<grins>

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] roly-poly bugs
messages.msgSnippet: ... But Joyce, maybe they re unschooled roly-poly bugs and have found a way to protect themselves based on their own experiments.  Maybe the PA bugs have all
messages.messageBody:
>> Roly-poly bugs or Pill bugs (the ones that live in basements, under porches
>> or any cool damp place. They roll up if touched.
>
> We've got boring ones here in Mass. The ones back in PA did that but the
> ones here are underacheivers. They just curve a bit. Maybe I should bring
> some real ones back with me next time I visit Pittsburgh to show them how
> it's supposed to be done!

But Joyce,
maybe they're unschooled roly-poly bugs and have found a way to protect
themselves based on their own experiments. Maybe the PA bugs have all been
"shown" how to properly roll all their lives and haven't ever had the chance
to try it their own way!
brenda...
who needs to get a real life or something.....

sorry, Joyce,
I just could not resist, and it appears that you have the sense of humor to
handle this!
